website_summaries.verdict: A great starter pack or addition to an already existing collection. Includes some great cars.
pros: Cars come in a variety of styles, shapes, and sizes
Cars are small enough to fit in a child's hands
cons: Wheel construction is not as durable as the body

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: The 9-Pack I received was in horrible condition! Three of the cars were not even Hot Wheels and a total of five cars were damaged. I’m only keeping them because one car was undamaged and it’s one I wanted. Very disappointed and dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: The variety is really good. If you know someone who's into Hot Wheels ...
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves Hot Wheels and he loves this. The variety is really good. If you know someone who's into Hot Wheels they are going to love this pack. I'm glad that my nephew still plays with these. He'll even play with them instead of using his video games which says a lot. Great variety and high quality as always from Hot Wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Hot Wheels for a cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: Got a sweet pack full of race cars, classic cars, futuristic looking cars, and even an off road type vehicle. Love every car and for 10 bucks shipped? Easy buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love this multi-pack!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing with Hot Wheels back in the late 60's and early 70's and always loved them as a child and while these aren't as good as the old red line wheeled versions of my youth they are pretty decent. I bought this pack for my autistic son to take to his school. His former teacher left behind some kind of a track and a few cars but this will give the kids a bit more variety. Very nice for the money they cost.
customer_reviews.author: MrChiSoxTop Contributor: Sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The four year old loves these cars. They're well made and nearly indestructible, a necessity when letting a four year old use them as you never know if they are cars or projectiles. I've not seen any damage to any of them, and believe me, they've been tested.
customer_reviews.author: Chazz

customer_reviews.title: Car Heaven
customer_reviews.text: These cars made my brother in law the happiest fella in the world!
customer_reviews.author: Aussie Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Hotwheels for days, cause for a happy 4 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Hotwheels are always a hit for a 4 year old boy and these didn't fail! They are bright in color and very durable. My only wish would be to have had a choice on which pack to choose instead of them sending whatever they choose. We did get a couple duplicates that he already had for this reason. I would be more inclined to buy additional sets if I had that option. Instead now, I'm not sure if I ordered more if he wouldn't already have some of them in his collection. Besides that, great item!
customer_reviews.author: Gina D FisherTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: (Styles May Vary) Get the worst only
customer_reviews.text: order 3 only get the same of the worst ,all the sets not even one good one Boxes with 4 bikers are the best but you can not choose (Styles May Vary) get the worst ones only NOT WORTH THE GAMBLE, SALE? Do not buy it
customer_reviews.author: G. White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a roadtrip!
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler is OBSESSED with cars. He absolutely adores Hot Wheels which is great because they're affordable and don't take up too much space. This is one of the reasons we bought the 9-car gift pack before going on a road trip. Everytime he started to get a bit fussy, BOOM, here's a Hot Wheel car. He was in heaven. Outside of the packaging, it was easy to toss them in a bag or purse. We love it and I'm sure any kid would love to receive them as a gift, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels: Always a Win!
customer_reviews.text: What is not to like about Hot Wheels? The value was excellent. The cars are really cool and all different types from concept to sedan to a Ferrari! I bought this set to accompany a Hot Wheel City set that I am passing down to my nephew. He will love it!
customer_reviews.author: VLK76

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, but be aware you won't necessarily get what is depicted
customer_reviews.text: A good deal for a pack of Hotwheels. Some people have complained that you don't get the same pack of cars that is shown in the advertisement, but I believe it is stated somewhere in the description that that is the case. Either-way, just be aware that if you want those cars exactly you likely won't get them. We did not, but didn't care as it was for our young son and he just wants any cars he can get his hands on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Great toys
customer_reviews.text: I have five year old twin boys and ordered two packs and they each came with different cars. Normally this would cause issues because we always have to buy exactly the same thing for both boys to avoid conflict of “why didn’t I get one of those” but this time they were both very happy to have different cars to add to their collection. Over all very happy with the purchase and the boys were also very happy with their Christmas present. Hot Wheels are still a good quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: FireRobTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Great little cars
customer_reviews.text: I got these to give my grandson for his birthday.....also the adorable Hot Wheels 30 car case to go with them. I can't wait for his birthday.....he is going to LOVE these!!!! I used to buy Hot Wheels and Matchbox cars 35 years ago for my son, and am thrilled they are still being made today. If you get the cars, don't hesitate to get the fabulous case to store them.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift box!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my five year old on his birthday. He can never have enough hot wheels. He was very happy with the selection in the box. Keep in mind that you see all of the vehicles you will get - there are none hidden behind the card board cover - it is 9. He had a good mix of vehicles that he was very happy with. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Treenz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toy cars for boys and girls
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality hot wheels cars, as they always are. I love the attention to detail and colors for the cars. My three-year-old grandson loved the cars, but would not put down the orange tow truck that came in the package. We spent many minutes searching for the tow truck which he carried everywhere with him, and then forgetting where he put it down. My seven and five year-old granddaughters also enjoyed playing with these cars as well as the garage we bought to play with them. I definitely recommend these cars to any child who loves toy tricks and cars.
customer_reviews.author: Joann S. Puchir

customer_reviews.title: Surprise collection at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack during the holiday season and used the cars for my daughter's advent calendar. She loved collecting them and the price was so affordable. I think it would make a fun birthday gift too when paired with a track set.
customer_reviews.author: Nbtokb

customer_reviews.title: My grandchild fell for them 🚗❤️🤴
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is going to be 12 months in 3 weeks, hot weels cars are one of his favorites, he moves them from one place to another without problem, we received them today in the morning and played with them all day. The cars are stylish and the material is strong and safe. I'm going to buy a collection for myself because I fell for them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my little boy. Where he proceeded to name them all super heroes and smash them together. I don't think the paint is scuffed yet and it's been several months. Very surprised, I will definitely be getting more. :)
customer_reviews.author: fanny

customer_reviews.title: Boys Love These 🚘🚙🚗
customer_reviews.text: My two boys love these! They have played and played with their cars. We bought 2 sets and some of the cars were different, which made playtime even more fun for them. They are great for any age as long as the child doesn't still put toys in their mouth.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hot wheels to play with.
customer_reviews.text: If you need non-collectible Hot Wheels for the kids to play with this is the way to go. It drives my kids nuts to see sealed containers of individual collectible Hot Wheels stored away in our attict that they can’t touch. So I purchased a couple of these sets and they were ecstatic that they received brand new hot wheels to play with, not leftovers from a yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still Bringing Smiles After All These Years!
customer_reviews.text: What kid wouldn’t love a multi pack of Hot Wheels cars? I bought this as part of a donation for a Toys for Tots drive and have no doubt it brought smiles on Christmas Day just like Hot Wheels did back in the day for me...and I’m in my 50’s now!
customer_reviews.author: Big Weave

customer_reviews.title: Good all around gift
customer_reviews.text: Kids love cars, and this is a good booster set to any collection. I was a Matchbox kid, opting for actual car models, not concept cars, but hot wheels typically race faster. Ordered several times and new cars in each set, so that is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Peter D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as prize incentives for my kids for cleaning their rooms each day. They have tons of hot wheels already, but this is what they really wanted for a prize. I worried we'd get duplicates or boring ones, but the box I got had a great variety!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great pack at great price!
customer_reviews.text: I opened this pack up and used it as chore chart rewards to add some variety to my kids. I love the variety pack and want to buy some more, but, I can't tell if I'll get the same cars. Either way, this would be a great gift for collectors too. I have boy/girl twins and they BOTH love the cars. Good job with this pack!
customer_reviews.author: APL720

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves his Hot Wheels
customer_reviews.text: My soon-to-be 3 year old grandson loves this Hot Wheels set. When he finishes playing with them he “parks” them side by side on a shelf. These are the usual high quality construction Hot Wheels is known for.
customer_reviews.author: Dede Carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son loves them!! he has been playing with them non stop...
customer_reviews.author: Verito

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for little boys and girls who love cars. It is a good set for one child or can be split up to fill birthday bags or stockings of several children. The cars are all the great quality I've come to expect from the Hot Wheels brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Easterling Collins

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved Hot Wheels since I was a little kid. Even as an adult they still mesmerize and fascinate me. I purchased these to donate and hope that who-ever receives enjoys them as much as I did! Amazon shipped them quickly and everything was effortless.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: THIS WAS A HIT WITH THE KIDS
customer_reviews.text: My kids love hot wheels and they flipped when they saw they got 9 of them! they absolutely love them they love collecting them too, just another one to add to their collection will be buying again, also got here on time
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Always a great product.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is autistic and obsessed with cars. Any size, color, type. He loves them. He even has a Hot Wheels backpack for preschool. He takes cars with him everywhere, so we love Hot Wheels because they're easy to take with us. My parents got him a variety set for Christmas, even though he already has a ton of them, just because he always loves getting new ones. I've never had a Hot Wheel car break or have paint peel off or anything. They're a great product and I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany H.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t take the bait
customer_reviews.text: 7 of the 9 are cheap plastic, light, knock/offs. The only good car or resemblance of a real Hot Wheel was the featured car which is cool but the other 8 are not worth having. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Random hot wheels for hot price
customer_reviews.text: You get the hot wheels at random but seriously it's hot wheels so what's not to love? Received all 9 and they were a great stocking stuffer. One of the little cars was a man in a race car which was new and interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids have fun with these
customer_reviews.text: I opened the packages and wrapped each one individually. Then I let the grandkids take turns choosing one of the wrapped cars. They really enjoyed opening them one by one. I also bought the dual track to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: SusantooTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just the gift for Hot Wheel Fanatics Young and Old (like me)!
customer_reviews.text: I was just browsing around Amazon and when I saw these I was transported back many, many years! Great assortment. I ordered two to have on hand and the two sets were different and great! I'd certainly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DuncansDad

customer_reviews.title: I find Hot Wheels to be sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson for Christmas. He is 3 years old and loves his "little" cars. I find Hot Wheels to be sturdy and well made. I purchased 2 sets of these and they were all different cars. I find it interesting that at even at his young age he is learning the makes and models of various automobiles. He loved this gift and I loved the price - at the time I purchased them the sets were on sale for $5.98 each set of 9 cars. Can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Mama P

customer_reviews.title: Great little cars for kids to play with
customer_reviews.text: These little cars are great. No the doors don’t open or close, but they are nice looking little cars and race well. For the price I think they are a good deal and I don’t freak out if we lose one or two. I keep some in my diaper bag to keep our kids entertained in a pinch. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MamadoesitbestTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Some of the cars don't fit the boosters in certain tracks
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to give to my godson for Christmas. Who doesn't like hot wheels. He has a blast with them. My only concern is that they're still using that dadgum lead paint from China.
customer_reviews.author: DeadNeck90

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift for my son. He loves Hot Wheels and they are durable little toys for an active, rough child. He loved them. The cars that came in were colorful and easy for small hands to play with. A few wheels ended up bent but that's due to my son being rough on toys. Hot Wheels are well worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set for the car loving kid!
customer_reviews.text: My hot wheels obessed child fell in love with this set! He has given all the cars ABSOLUTELY no mercy (he plays hard lol) and they have held up well. These make a great gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cammy

customer_reviews.title: Boys love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Hot Wheels truck hauler carrying case for my grandson for his birthday and I wanted to add extra cars to go with it. This package of Hot Wheel cars fit the bill. I am glad that I bought the extra car package.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Nice random selection.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent variety for $ 1 0, I was very pleased with what we got. Keep in mind these are pretty random and some could have some weird or not that impressive cars.
customer_reviews.author: Sc33

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as an angel tree gift so I can't say if the recipient liked them but they are hot wheels which is what he wanted so I'm sure they were a hit. The assortment that I was sent was good and the cars were really cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels - still a great gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought Hot Wheels years ago for the now grown kids and we will definitely be giving this set to their kids soon. We know they will like the variety of cars found in the Hot Wheels 9-Car Gift Pack.
customer_reviews.author: citrushome

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this knowing I could get any set. It was for my grandson I happened to luck out and get the one with the hudson hornet in it. My grandson loves toystory so this was perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin wags kane

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Collection
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson flipped over these Hot Wheels! He added them to his collection. The price was great too. After all a boy can't have too many wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: Every boy needs this set!
customer_reviews.text: Hot wheels quality, and a great selection of very cool looking cars. This was a gift for a 4 year old boy. He couldn't put them down and has played with them almost daily since Christmas, almost 3 months ago. Good price too
customer_reviews.author: HuntandFishVATop Contributor: Beekeeping

customer_reviews.title: Vroom Vroom
customer_reviews.text: I will start off by saying that I am very supportive of presents that are NOT electronic. Its alright to have some, but I am also so secretly happy when my cousins are into other things too. If that makes me old school, I will take it as a compliment! I used to like hot wheels growing up, so it was a little sentimental that my little cousins still like things like that. I felt like the price was fair for what was included. I would recommend this product and the seller. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C

customer_reviews.title: Fun Cars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set of cars for my grandson's 4th birthday and he LOVES them as he does all little cars. He has to take at least two with him wherever he goes!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Akins

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of cars!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our grandson, to fill up a Hot Wheels Car Carrier Truck. It's a great selection of Hot Wheels that any kid would like!
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Burthday cars
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure why this review asks about warmth. They're cars. Other than that they came in perfect time for my godsons birthday hes gonna love them
customer_reviews.author: Abby Read

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels 9 car gift set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a 3 year old young man who wanted nothing but cars - specifically Hot Wheels. They are sturdy cars, good bright colors and durable for this young man who runs them all over the floors inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived fast shipping and packages well withe bubble wrap. The items are exactly as pictured, great value for the price . Very pleased. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Lara

customer_reviews.title: Classic Hot Wheels!  Winner Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a secret Santa Christmas gift for a 5 year old at a local school. I thought it was a great gift at a great price. This is classic Hot Wheels...you can't go wrong here! There's quite a few cars in the gift set for a small child to remain interested in!!! The gift was dropped off by a co-ordinator, so sadly, I'm unaware of the child's reaction to the gift. I only hope he did like all the cars.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift great price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 3 year old boy who is in love with cars! The package arrived on time and in great condition all 9 cars were different and the special style car was cool looking. I had ordered another one of these before Christmas and the cars in that package were different from the second!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Gift...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice assortment of cars. Came undamaged with accurate and fast delivery. A perfect gift for a friend's eight year old son.
customer_reviews.author: billypuppy

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to go with the Loader.
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Nice set to go with other hot wheels toys. Nice set for starting the collection too. I had ordered the big transfer truck carrier weeks earlier ... and three days before Christmas realized that I did not have a single car for the carrier to carry! Promptly ordered; and behold, it arrived so very quickly!! In time for Christmas and grandsons' arrival. Whew!
customer_reviews.author: judgment as the noonday

customer_reviews.title: Vvroooom
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hHot Wheels fanatic. My grandson is only 18moths old and I've been collecting them for him or his third birthday since h was born. so far, the election send @ 50 - but there will be more to come I'm certain.
customer_reviews.author: Pedinrs

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Depending on the Hot Wheel brand for durability. Purchased a couple, one set to donate and one on hand for the grands when they visit.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: These Cars are Strong
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason why these cars are expensive. They are so durable. They can handle abuse well. They will last generations.
customer_reviews.author: LuppaMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of hot wheel cars
customer_reviews.text: I broke apart the box and whenever I go see the grand kids I give them on each. They love it. Very cool car and truck selection.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: I buy these a lot
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these all the time. For holidays, birthdays really any occasion. They are a great product, great value for the product. I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: 4 Year old.....Hot Wheels
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nephew and he loved it. He started busting it open the minute he unwrapped it. He was so excited when he saw it. he couldn't contain his excitement. I knew that i did good when he was wanting me to help him open it. I would recommend this to everyone with a little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P.Top Contributor: Fragrance

customer_reviews.title: It's Hot Wheels cars ... in a box :)
customer_reviews.text: It's 9 Hot Wheels cars - that's about it folks :) Hot Wheels cars are good quality and last a long time. Bought this as a gift for our nephew, he'll have them for years to come (should he play with them that long). Bought as a Warehouse Deal (which I LOVE on Amazon) so our box needed some tape love, but otherwise - they're great, work great and play great. Thanks Hot Wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Galle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great mix of very cool looking toy cars. Not a bunch of boring, identical looking cars. Well made, seem like they are sturdier for long term enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: FrannyK

customer_reviews.title: Basic hot wheel cars
customer_reviews.text: Not much can be said that hasn't been covered before. Basic metal hot wheels cars for use with the many launchers/tracks available for purchase. You wont be breaking these anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels 9-Car Gift Pack
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 4 year old grandson. He was very excited, and couldn't open the package quick enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jane G

customer_reviews.title: All kinds of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy cars. Had them for a while and they are surprisingly very durable. Well be returning for my when it's my nephews birthdays again.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my nephew. Hot wheels are a good brand of toy car. I have always believed they are quality and well made roll very well and painted nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa C

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old grandson so excited. Loves seeing AMAZON smile arrow. He says the boxes with Nana’s smile are the best. 🤣😇
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for Toys for Tots. Packaging was fine and I hope the child enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: Bollycats

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Fun cars that are great as gifts for kids. One of the cars came with bent wheels and the paint decals rub off easily and relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.author: laura S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packaged and an awesome price! Will order more for christmas presents for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Blair McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Good birthday/ return gift for car loving kids within budget
customer_reviews.text: Good birthday/ return gift for car loving kids within budget. Classic brand name toy loved by a wide age range. Good for kids as young as 3 years old who love playing cars and good for older kids (tweens/ teens) who love collecting.
customer_reviews.author: Indranil Biswas

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels forever
customer_reviews.text: I played with when I was a child I want my grandson to experience the same thing I did when I played with them and race them
customer_reviews.author: Mario hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kiddos.
customer_reviews.text: Their the same old, good old hot wheels that most kids love. Has worked with all hot wheels accessories we have tried them with.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Norton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hot Wheel track but a bit too much for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Some aspects need an engineer to put together, but you can make simple tracks for little ones and they still enjoy it. If they don't lose the parts, they can grow with the more advanced pieces. It comes in a storage case so that's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The classic!
customer_reviews.text: These are your classic hot wheels cars. The assortment of cars is different every time, so its hard to say what you'll get, but as with most hot wheels sets, there's a pretty good range of colors and car types. They're the same quality you'll find in regular toy stores individual packs.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly as displayed. My son ways so happy to get these. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JHarney

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This will be a perfect gift for my grandson. The box arrived with no dents or scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Niteowl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As usual Hot Wheels manufacturers a high quality toy. Nine cars are included, all different, all with great details. Wheels are first rate, so they roll smoothly over all surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: modestogirl

customer_reviews.title: Okay - beware mine came with two of the same car... right next to each other in the pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Did not mine the 'styles may very' but I did mind that two of the cars were the same and were right next to each other. This was a gift to donate so I did not have the chance to try to return. Cars all looked good and if it wasn't for getting two of the same car and right next to each other it would have gotten 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Makes a Great Stocking Stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: How Wheels have universal appeal with kids. A great gift for a stocking stuffer or buy them for toys for tots type charity gift giving around the holidays! A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly with the Criss Cross Crash Track set and the variety we got are VERY cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ackpfft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew for Christmas it came quick and not damaged in shipping I can't wait to see him open it
customer_reviews.author: Brandytaylor2232

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler Gift
customer_reviews.text: Makes for a great gift! Gave this as a gift to our toddler nephew and he loved them!
customer_reviews.author: nick h

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 packs of these for 2 twin boys. They were both different so that was a plus. Its a great deal, you get 9 cars for only $7.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M

customer_reviews.title: Very cool cars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew. They were well packaged and undamaged. They arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my nephew love it
customer_reviews.text: nice quality and quantity , and my nephew love Hot Wheels Specific so he love them
customer_reviews.author: G. Borrego

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Set of Cars! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: A terrific gift for a kid in the hospital. Lots of cars! Great set! Shiny cars!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: It's impossible to have too many Hot Wheels cars!
customer_reviews.text: my 12 year old loves cars. I got him this 9-pack and, needless to say he was happy. he told me his favorite was a 2017 corvette stingray. whatever that is, he liked it. great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was delighted with this on Christmas morning! Great cars in a great presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great hot wheels set!
customer_reviews.text: The Hot Wheels car set was just what my nephew wanted! He pretty much tore right through the box to get all the cars out! The cars were in excellent condition and made of a strong metal material.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Boys love Hot Wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for the kid that was turning 5. It was a gift from my son to another kid.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morehead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a hot wheel fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great presentation and variety of cars. I bought these to add the cars to an 'Operation Christmas Child' shoebox gift. The cars are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Hot wheels are timeless
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like Hot wheels? Great little pack for a Birthday boy. I coupled this pack of cars with a great Hot wheels storage box so he can learn to clean up his toys as well! Very happy with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a gear head and I wanted to do a car theme treasure hunt for his birthday and this was perfect for the dispersion of clues around the house and town!
customer_reviews.author: Phobos Maximus

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived in the expected time. Its packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in the expected time. Its packaging has nothing bent or broken. The product was tested and works perfectly. My only annoyance is in handling the boxes in the mail. In several orders I have made have come battered. I suggest adding air pockets to cushion those blows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Pleasantly surprised. Great variety.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed. I knew I was taking a chance when I got a random box, but these are all winners. These are gifts but I'd be tempted to get another box for home but I don't need more "stuff" filling up my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mary von

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these. Very well made. Very pleased with quality AND quantity
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great hot wheels
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these cars. So excited to see them Christmas morning. Durable and original
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

product_meta.title: Hot Wheels 9-Car Gift Pack (Styles May Vary), Multicolor (X6999)
product_meta.description: Hot Wheels has been challenging the limits since 1968, passionately creating the coolest and craziest toy cars and tracks for non-stop fun. Hot Wheels evolved from a line of 16 die-cast cars into a global lifestyle brand dedicated to fast action and over-the-top, epic stunts. These race-ready 9-car packs feature highly detailed vehicles in an instant collection for car enthusiasts of all ages. Nine times the amped up action with authentic details and eye-catching decos these packs make a great gift for kids and collectors.
feature_bullets: Packs include nine Hot Wheels vehicles
In 1:64 scale with authentic styling and one exclusive deco
Build an epic collection — get started with the 9-pack or add to the one you have!
Makes a great gift for kids and collectors of all ages.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
